entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is introduced as a werewolf and one of the four creators of the Marauder's Map. He is also mentioned to be married to Tonks.

entities.name: moony
entities.description: Moony is Lupin's nickname, used by him when referring to himself.

entities.name: marauders map
entities.description: The Marauder's Map is a magical object created by the four friends, including Lupin.

entities.name: nymphadora
entities.description: Nymphadora is Lupin's wife, also known as Tonks.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is Nymphadora's nickname, used by her when referring to herself.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: The Patronus is a magical object that takes the form of a stag and was taught to Harry by Lupin.

entities.name: severus
entities.description: Severus is mentioned as someone who might be involved in the situation, but there is no sign of him.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are a group of people being watched by Lupin and his friends.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who should not lower their defenses too quickly.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who should not lower her defenses too quickly.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is being taught by Lupin how to produce a Patronus.
